type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be StreetlightControlCabinet

serialNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/serialNumber'. Serial number of the container.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refStreetlightGroup.description: Relationship. Streetlight group(s) controlled. List of references to entities of type StreetlightGroup

brandName.description: Property. Name of the cabinet's brand. Model:'https://schema.org/brand'

modelName.description: Property. Name of the cabinet's model. Model:'https://schema.org/model'

manufacturerName.description: Property. Name of the cabinet's manufacturer. Model:'https://schema.org/manufacturer'

cupboardMadeOf.description: Property. Material the cabinet's cupboard is made of. Enum:'concrete, metal, other, plastic'

features.description: Property. A list of cabinet controller features.  Those technical values considered meaningful by applications. `astronomicalClock`. The control cabinet includes an astronomical clock to deal with switching hours. `individualControl`. The control cabinet allows to control street lights individually.

compliantWith.description: Property. A list of standards to which the cabinet controller is compliant with (ex. IP54)

annotations.description: Property. A field reserved for annotations (incidences, remarks, etc.)

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refDevice.description: Relationship. Reference to the device(s) used to monitor this control cabinet.

dateServiceStarted.description: Property. Date at which the cabinet controller started giving service. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

dateLastProgramming.description: Property. Date at which there was a programming operation over the cabinet. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

nextActuationDeadline.description: Property. Deadline for next actuation to be performed (programming, testing, etc.). Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

responsible.description: Property. Responsible for the cabinet controller, i.e. entity in charge of actuating (programming, etc.).

workingMode.description: Property. Working mode for this cabinet controller.  `automatic` : The cabinet controller decides automatically when light groups are switched on and off. Manual operation is not allowed. `manual` : Human intervention is required for switching on and off. `semiautomatic` : The same as `automatic` but in this case manual intervention is allowed.

description.description: Property. Timestamp of the last change of lamp made

maximumPowerAvailable.description: Property. The maximum power available (by contract) for the circuits controlled by this cabinet. Units:'Kilowatts (kW)'

energyConsumed.description: Property. Energy consumed by the circuits controlled since metering started (since dateMeteringStarted). Units:'Kilowatts per hour (kWh)'. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

energyCost.description: Property. Cost of the energy consumed by the circuits controlled since the metering start date. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

reactiveEnergyConsumed.description: Property. Energy consumed (with regards to reactive power) by circuits since the metering start date. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'KiloVolts-Ampere-Reactive per hour (kVArh)'

dateMeteringStarted.description: Property. The starting date for metering energy consumed. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

lastMeterReading.description: Property. Value of the last reading obtained from the energy consumed metering system. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Units:'Kilowatts per hour (kWh)'

meterReadingPeriod.description: Property. The periodicity of energy consumed meter readings in days. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

frequency.description: Property. The working frequency of the circuit. Units:'Hertz (Hz)'

totalActivePower.description: Property. Active power currently consumed (counting all phases). Units:'KiloWatts (kW)'

totalReactivePower.description: Property. Reactive power currently consumed (counting all phases). Units:'KiloVolts-Ampere-Reactive (kVArh)'

activePowerR.description: Property. Active power consumed in R phase. Units:'Kilowatts (kW)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

activePowerS.description: Property. Active power consumed in S phase. Units:'Kilowatts (kW)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

activePowerT.description: Property. Active power consumed in T phase. Units:'Kilowatts (kW)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

reactivePowerR.description: Property. Reactive power in R phase. Units:'KiloVolts-Ampere-Reactive (kVArh)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

reactivePowerS.description: Property. Reactive power in S phase. Units:'KiloVolts-Ampere-Reactive (kVArh)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

reactivePowerT.description: Property. Reactive power in T phase. Units:'KiloVolts-Ampere-Reactive (kVArh)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

powerFactorR.description: Property. Power factor for phase R. Allowed values: A number between -1 and 1. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

powerFactorS.description: Property. Power factor for phase S. Allowed values: A number between -1 and 1. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

powerFactorT.description: Property. Power factor for phase T. Allowed values: A number between -1 and 1. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

cosPhi.description: Property. Cosine of phi parameter. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

intensityR.description: Property. Electric intensity in R phase. Units:'Ampers (A)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

intensityS.description: Property. Electric intensity in S phase. Units:'Ampers (A)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

intensityT.description: Property.  Electric intensity in T phase. Units:'Ampers (A)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

voltageR.description: Property. Electric tension in phase R. Units:'Volts (V)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

voltageS.description: Property. Electric tension in phase S. Units:'Volts (V)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

voltageT.description: Property. Electric tension in phase T. Units:'Volts (V)'. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

thdrVoltageR.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (R) of voltage in phase R. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

thdrVoltageS.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (S) of voltage in phase S. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

thdrVoltageT.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (T) of voltage in phase T. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

thdrIntensityR.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (R) of intensity in phase R. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

thdrIntensityS.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (S) of intensity in phase S. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'

thdrIntensityT.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (T) of intensity in phase T. Allowed values: A number between 0 and 1. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'
